Introduction

Nakamoto Yuta is a Japanese singer, actor, and radio host under SM Entertainment. He is best known for being a member of South Korean boy group NCT and it's sub-units NCT 127 and NCT U. In July 2016, he made his official debut in NCT 127 with their first EP NCT #127.

Prior to debuting, Yuta was a member of SM's pre-debut rookie team SMROOKIES and was revealed to the public on December 24, 2013.
